[C] During your turn, all your other "Tohka, Day of the Date" gain +2000 Power.
[A] BOND/"Tohka, Day of the Date" [(1)]

[C] If you are Level 1 or higher, this gains the following ability. "[S] [Put this in the Waiting Room] Choose a 'Kotori, Ratatosk Commander' in your Waiting Room and place it in the Slot this was in."
[C] All your other Characters with ::Date:: and/or ::Spirit (DL):: gain +500 Power.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If if is a ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: Character, put it in your hand and choose a card in your hand and discard that card to the Waiting Room. (Otherwise put it back)
[A] [Discard a Character with ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: in your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the stage, you may pay cost. If so, draw a card.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have another ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: Character, for the turn this gets +2000 Power.
[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +2500 Power for the turn.

[C] On your turn if all of your Characters are ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental::, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] CX COMBO [Put the top card of your Library into your Clock] When "We" is placed to your Climax Zone, if this is in the Front Row, you may pay cost. If so, choose and perform one of the following effects. "Search your Library for up to 2 'Kurumi, Engraving Despair', place them to separate Slots on your Stage, and shuffle your Library." "Choose up to 2 'Kurumi, Engraving Despair' in your Waiting Room and place them to separate Slots on your Stage."
--None--

[A] When your other ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: attacks, for the turn this gets +2000 Power.
[A] ENCORE [Discard a ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: Character from your hand to the Waiting Room]
[C] For each of your other ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental:: Characters this gains +1000 Power.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, this gains +4500 Power and the following ability until the next end of your Opponent's turn. "[C] During Battles involving this Character, neither player may play BACKUP from hand."
[A] [(2)] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may pay cost. If so, deal 1 Damage to your Opponent. (Damage Cancel can occur)
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[A] At the beginning of your Main Phase, look at the top card of your Library and put it either on top of the Library or in the Waiting Room.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, draw up to 1 card.
[A] [(1) At the start of your Opponent's Attack Phase, you may pay cost. If so, move this to an empty Slot in the Back Row.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2500, Level 1 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] For each of your other ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental:: Characters this gains +500 Power.
[A] ENCORE [Put the top card of your Library in your Clock]

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.
[A] [Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so,look at up to 4 card from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 ::Date:: or ::Spirit(DL):: Character, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] [Discard 2 cards from hand to the Waiting Room]. When this attacks, if you have 2 or more other ::Date:: and/or ::Spirit(DL):: Characters, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your Opponent's Cost 1 or lower Back Row Characters and put it on the bottom of their Library.

If you do not have a ::Date:: or ::Spirit(DL) Character, you cannot play this from hand.
Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it in your hand, and put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room.
(this card is not a valid target for abilities that search for 'a card with "Shido" in name')
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +2 Soul.

[A] At the start of your Climax Phase, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +500 Power for the turn.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and
put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, search your Library for up to 1 ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: Character, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[C] On your turn, if you have another ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: Character, this gains +1500 Power.
[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "Candy in One Hand" is in your Climax Zone, perform the following action twice. "Reveal the top card of your Library. If that card is a ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: Character, or an Event, put it in your hand." (otherwise put it back)

[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental:: Characters, this gains +1500 Power and the following ability. "[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may send that Character to Memory."
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] [(3) Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, your Opponent puts the bottom 5 cards of their Library into their Waiting Room, deal X Damage to your Opponent, and for the turn this gains +2000 Power. X equals the number of Climax Cards moved to your Opponent's Waiting Room by this effect. (Damage Cancel can occur)

[C] All your other Characters with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental:: gain +500 Power.
[S] [Rest this] Choose up to 2 Characters with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental:: in your Clock and send them to Memory. At the end of the turn, choose 2 Characters in your Memory and place them to the bottom of your Clock in any order.
[S] [Rest this] Choose up to 2 Characters with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental:: in your Waiting Room and put them on the bottom of your Clock in any order. If you moved 2 Characters in this way, at the end of the turn, put the bottom two cards of your Clock in the Waiting Room.

[C] During your turn for each of your other Characters with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental:: this gains +500 Power.
[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "Special Existence" is in your Climax Zone, and you have another ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: Character, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 of them, place it to your Stock, and put the remaining cards on the top of your Library or your Waiting Room in any order.

[A] [(2)] When you use the BACKUP of this, you may pay cost. If so, return all cards in your Waiting Room to the Library and shuffle your Library.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2500, Level 2 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +2000 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose 1 of the following 3 actions and perform it. "Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1, put it in your hand, and put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room." "You may choose a Character with ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: in your Waiting Room and return it to hand." "For the turn all of your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul."

[C] If '"Frenzied Nightmare" Kurumi' is in your Clock, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at the top X cards of your Library, choose up to 1 and put it in your hand, and you the remaining cards in the Waiting Room. X equals the number of your Characters with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental::.

[A] When this attacks, if you have 1 or fewer other Characters, you may put the top card of your Library in the Waiting Room. If it's a Level 0 or lower Character, put it in any Slot in the Back Row.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may put that Character in Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose up to 1 of your Opponent's Characters and Send it to Memory, and your Opponent puts that Character from Memory to any Slot on their Stage.
[S] [(1) Put this in the Waiting Room] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 Character with ::Date:: or ::Elemental::, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If it is a Character with ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: or is "My Little Shido", for the turn this gets +1 Soul. (put the revealed card back)
[A] Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your Characters with ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: and return it to hand.

[C] If you are Level 3 or higher, this gains the following ability. "[S] [(2) Put this in the Waiting Room] Choose a 'Kotori, Murderous Expression' in your Waiting Room and place it to the Slot this was in."
[C] During your turn, all of your other ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental:: Characters gain +1000 Power.

[C] All of your Opponent's Characters gain "[A] ENCORE [(2)]".
[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When this becomes Reversed in battle, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's Level 2 or higher, you may Rest this. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect. Put the revealed card back where it was)

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.
[S] [Rest this] Choose up to 2 Characters with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental:: in your Clock and send them to Memory. At the end of the turn, choose 2 Characters in your Memory and place them to the bottom of your Clock in any order.
[S] [Rest this] Choose 2 Characters with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental:: in your Waiting Room and put them to the bottom of your Clock in any order. If you put 2 cards this way, at the end of the turn, put the bottom 2 cards of your Clock in the Waiting Room.

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +500 Power.
[A] When your Character's Trigger Check reveals a Climax card, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +1 Soul for the turn.

[S] [(1) Rest this] Reveal the top card of your Library. If that card is a Character with ::Date:: or ::Elemental::, put it in your hand. (otherwise put it back)
[S] CX COMBO [Discard 2 cards from hand] Choose a "Exists to Stand in the Way" in your Waiting Room and place it to your Climax Zone.

[S] [Discard a "Kannazuki, Suggestions for Relaxing" from your hand to your Waiting Room, Rest this] Choose 1 of the following 2 actions and perform it. "Choose a Character in your Opponent's Front Row and return it to their hand." "Choose a Character with ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand."

[C] You may have as many copies of cards with the same name as this in your deck.
[A] At the beginning of your Climax Phase, until the next end of your Opponent's Turn this gains +X Power. X equals the number of "Kurumi, Split Body" in your Clock times 1000.

[A] This ability activates up to twice per turn. When another of your Characters with ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: is placed from hand to the Stage, for the turn this gets +1000 Power.
[A] [(2)] When this is placed in the Waiting Room from the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a Character with ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.
--None--

]A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have 4 or more other Characters with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental::, you may choose a Character with ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: in your Waiting Room and place it to your Stock.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is higher than the Level of your Opponent, you may put that Character in Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room.

Choose 1 of your Standing Characters with ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: and Rest it. If so, choose 1 of the following 3 actions and perform it.
"Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 Character with ::Date:: or ::Elemental::, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room."
"Choose 1 of your Opponent's Level 1 or higher Characters, your Opponent chooses an X or lower Character from their Waiting Room, and Swap those Characters. X equals the Level of the Opponent's Character you chose minus 1."
"If you have 6 or less cards in your hand, choose a Level 3 or higher Character in your Waiting Room and return it to hand."
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +2 Soul.

[A] When your Opponent's Climax card is placed in the Climax Zone, you may put this in your Stock.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your Opponent's Clock in the Waiting Room. If so, put that Character in Clock.

[C] If there are 2 or fewer Climax cards in your Waiting Room, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[A] CX COMBO When "Frozen Ground" is placed in your Climax Zone, this is in the Front Row, and you have 4 or more other Characters with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental::, until the next end of your Opponent's turn this may Side Attack without Soul penalty and gains the following ability. "[C] The Character Opposite this gets -2 Soul."
[A] [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] At the start of your Opponent's Attack Phase, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your other Characters and this, Stand and Swap them, and this gains +2000 Power for the turn.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose 1 of your Level 2 or higher Characters, and that Character gains +1500 Power for the turn.

[C] If all of your Characters are ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental::, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] CX COMBO When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, if "Super Genius Apology" is in your Climax Zone, choose up to 1 Level 0 or lower card in your Waiting Room, put it to Stock, reveal the top card of your Library, and if that card is Level 1 or higher, put it in your hand. (Climax cards are considered Level 0. Otherwise, put the revealed card back)

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If that card is a Character with ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: or "Basic Manifestation Device", for the turn all of your Opponent's Front Row Characters get -500 Power. (put the revealed card back)

[A] At beginning of your Encore Step, if "Large Tears" is in your Climax Zone, you may put this card to Memory. If so, at the beginning of your Draw Step, choose one "Yoshino, Lost Yoshinon" in your Memory, place it to any slot on the Stage, during the turn, that card gains +3500 Power.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's Level 0 or lower, put it in your Stock. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect. Otherwise put it back where it was)
[A] [Discard a card from Hand to Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 Event, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[C] All your other Characters with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental:: gain +500 Power.
[A] [Discard a Climax Card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When your Character reveals a Climax Card during Trigger Check, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1, put it in your hand, and put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may reveal your hand. If so, if there is a Climax among them, for the turn all of your Opponent's Front Row Characters get -500 Power.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage,reveal the top card of your Library. If is is a Character with ::Date:: or ::Elemental::, for the turn this may Side Attack without Soul penalty. (put the revealed card back)

put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, perform the following action. "Choose a ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: Character in your Waiting Room, return it to your hand, choose a card in your hand and discard it to the Waiting Room."

[A] When this attacks, choose another of your ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: Character, and for the turn that Character gains +X Power. X equals the number of Events in your Waiting Room times 1500.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is higher than the Level of the Opponent, you may put the top card of your Opponent's Clock in the Waiting Room. If so, put that Character in Clock.

[A] When this attacks, if the Level of the Character Opposite this is 3 or higher, this gains +6000 Power for the turn.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, put the top 2 cards of your Library in your Waiting Room. If there were at least 1 Climax card among them, choose a Character in your Opponent's Front Row, and that Character gets -1000 Power for the turn.
[A] At the beginning of your Climax Phase, choose 1 of your ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: Characters, and for the turn that Character gains +1000 Power.

[C] If all of your Characters are ::Date:: or ::Elemental::, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] [Put the top card of your Stock in your Clock] When this is placed from the Stage to the Waiting Room, you may pay cost. If so, choose a card in your Clock and return it to your hand, and put the top card of your Library in your Clock.

[C] Your other "Origami, Terms of Exchange" in the Front Row Center Slot gains +2000 Power.
[S] [Rest this] Choose 1 of your ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: Characters, and for the turn that Character gains +500 Power and the following ability. "[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may put the top card of your Opponent's Clock in their Waiting Room. If you do, put that Character to their Clock."
